stories.Title: What the future holds for OpenAI
stories.Description: In a recent conversation with a group of developers, Sam Altman shed light on OpenAI's roadmap, emphasizing the importance of responsible regulation alongside the preservation of open source ideals.
stories.Tweet: What the future holds for OpenAI 📦 In a recent conversation with a group of developers, Sam Altman shed light on OpenAI's roadmap, emphasizing the importance of responsible regulation alongside the preservation of open source ideals. #openai https://humanloop.com/blog/openai-plans?

stories.Title: The MIT team is keeping things “SimPLE”
stories.Description: Researchers at MIT's CSAIL team have unveiled a scalable model that outshines larger counterparts, with self-learning capabilities that eliminate the need for annotated data.
stories.Tweet: The MIT team is keeping things “SimPLE” 📦 Researchers at MIT's CSAIL team have unveiled a scalable model that outshines larger counterparts, with self-learning capabilities that eliminate the need for annotated data. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/mit-researchers-develop-self-learning-language-models-that-outperform-larger-counterparts/

stories.Title: Hurry up if you want your domain!
stories.Description: A report by Axios reveals a significant increase of 156% in .ai domain registrations, overshadowing the growth of .com registrations. Are you planning to launch an AI innovation? Secure your spot now.

stories.Title: Designer lands into Teams
stories.Description: The AI-powered art-generating tool is now available for free, allowing users to effortlessly produce stunning visuals for presentations and digital content.

stories.Title: An electrifying road is ahead

stories.Title: Just days ahead of the WWDC…
stories.Description: Meta steals the spotlight from Apple in the mixed-reality arena with the announcement of Quest 3. Offering "high-res color mixed reality", a thinner design, and enhanced graphics.
